name: Volcanion
description: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.
